post:
Hi, there!
Because few days ago we added option to pay with cryptocurrencies, we updated our offer and moved budget VPS Server from OVH Germany to Romania.

**VPS SSD Budget - 512MB**
 vCPU: 1x @3.50 GHz (2.70Ghz base freq.)
 Memory: RAM 512MB
 Storage: 10GB SSD
 Network: 100Mbps
 Monthly traffic: 5TB
 AntiDDoS: Voxility @1Tbps
Pricing: 2.35$ per month
[https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=29](https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=29 "https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=29")


**VPS SSD 2GB**
 vCPU: 1x @3.50 GHz
 Memory: RAM 2048MB
 Storage: 30GB SSD
 Network: 1000Mbps
 Monthly traffic: 5TB
 AntiDDoS: Voxility @1Tbps
Pricing: 5,90$ per month (4.73$ per month with annual payment)
[https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=26](https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=26 "https://hazi.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=26")

Cryptocurrencies accepted: Bitcoin, Ethereum, USD Coin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Dai, Bitcoin Cash

Best regards, Florin.
